lower the heat to medium low and simmer

get about a tablespoon amount ginger
will enhance the flavor and give another
dimension to the drink you can either

extract the juice okay so after
simmering for 15 minutes the tamarind
mixture has thickened add in a pinch of
salt and a tablespoon of the grated
ginger simmer for five more minutes
and tie off the heat the tamarind
mixture will get thicker when it's
cooled down or chilled
finally add in 2 to 3 tbsp of roasted
sesame seeds this stammering jam is

add about 3 to 4 TSP of the tamarind
